featured.text: According to a recent study, the part of your brain that reacts to severe pain is largely the same part that reacts to expectation of pain.
Our reaction to pain is closely related to our expectation of pain.
This is mainly a result of parental expectations.

definition.zh_def: 期望，預期的事物或結果。
definition.en_def: A belief that something will happen or be the case in the future.
definition.example: Her expectation was that she would receive a promotion this year.
